The next Nintendo Direct went official this morning. After months of rumors of an official, proper Direct showcase, it is finally on the slate. Nintendo has been cranking these things out faster and more frequent than ever since Switch 2 hit store shelves, but they have largely come in the form of dedicated showcases for specific titles and those Direct side quests: IndieWorld and Partner Showcase. This week though, we get the real deal.

As we have already detailed, pre-orders on the new Apple Watch Series 11 wearables are now live at Apple and Amazon. That said, if you have some free store credit at Amazon, you might be able to score one for less over there (we have featured a ton of promotions with FREE Amazon credit attached over the last month or more), and Best Buy is offering some elevated trade-in values on Series 10 (and other models) that can knock $180 or more off your new Apple Watch Series 11.

items.title: AMAZINGTHING’s iPhone 17 lineup include cases with ultra-thin aramid fiber, anti-yellow coating, more
items.summary:
Apple just unveiled the iPhone 17, and if you’re gearing up to place your preorder, now’s the perfect time to snag a quality case to keep your new device protected from day one. A bunch of case makers are ready for the iPhone 17 launch, and the folks over at AMAZINGTHING have also announced an all‑new range of accessories for the new iPhones starting at just $23.99 shipped, headlined by the TITAN PRO series. From ultra-thin aramid fiber cases to crystal-clear options with anti-yellowing protection and more, there’s an entire lineup of iPhone 17 accessories from AMAZINGTHING waiting to be explored below. AMAZINGTHING’s iPhone 17 collection is now live on the brand’s official website, with a 17% launch discount available on all models from September 9 to 18.

items.title: Save $202 on commercial-grade cutting power with Greenworks’ 82V 16-inch cordless chainsaw at a new $198 low
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the Greenworks 82V Commercial-Grade 16-inch Cordless Chainsaw with a 4.0Ah battery and dual-port rapid charger at $198.11 shipped. This newer model has only been on the market since February and ranges between $300 and $400 on average, with regular periods spent down at the former. While there have been a few discounts under that rate, we’ve recently seen it cascading down in price since late August, with the 50% markdown here cutting $202 off the tag for the best new price we have tracked.

more…

LISEN Fast Charging Apple Watch USB-C Cable

Buy for $16 (Reg. $30)

Prime-exclusive discount. Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

What we love

While the official fast charging Apple Watch cable is listed for $29, it’s currently $24 at Amazon right now. That said, this LISEN alternative costs only $16 for Prime members and a 20W wall charger is included, which is not the case when you take the official Apple route.

items.title: SANDMARC unleashes gorgeous new metal and leather iPhone 17 cases [Exclusive pre-order deal]
items.summary:
Not all leather iPhone cases are made equal and the SANDMARC lineup is the perfect example of that. Over the last couple years the brand has delivered some of the most gorgeous leather cases on the market, and I think it just upped its game again with the new iPhone 17 lineup. Featuring a series of different full-grain leather color treatments, it has an all new metal lens preotector/mount that is seriously awesome looking. And you can use code 9TO5TOYS at checkout to score a sweet launch deal.

items.title: Up to 60-hour battery headlines Anker’s Soundcore Q30 headphones with active noise cancellation at $56
items.summary:
Anker Soundcore Life Q30 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones

Buy for $56 (Reg. $80)

What we love

While these may not be the latest and greatest headphones just stepping into the market, you’ll be getting plenty of bang for your buck, complete with active noise cancellation. It’s been designed for long listening sessions, with detachable earcups and an ergonomic shape to combat ear fatigue – plus, you’ll get 40 hours of wireless audio with noise cancellation activated (60 hours in standard mode), with only a five-minute quick charge adding another four hours to the battery.

items.title: Save up to $150 on Whisker Litter-Robot 4 and 3 Connect bundles at lowest prices starting from $599
items.summary:
Whisker has several Litter-Robot bundles getting up to $150 discounts going right now, with the latest Litter-Robot 4 self-cleaning litter box getting a three-year warranty bundle at $699 shipped, which Amazon doesn’t match but offers alternative bundles. This bundle would normally cost you $799 at full price, which gives you the three-year protection at the same price that the solo unit with no warranty goes for, making it all the better of a deal. Many of the discounts we’ve seen since its release in November have been $50 to $75 markdowns, which ramped up to $100 during Memorial Day, Christmas, Black Friday, and most recently, Labor Day. This is another chance to score your own at the best price we have tracked, which I cannot say enough good things about in my hands-on review from November. Likewise, you can also find the predecessor Litter-Robot 3 Connect 3-year warranty bundle at its $599 low, while Amazon has a 1-year warranty deal at $549 – with a hands-on review available for this model, as well.

items.title: Lectric’s Endless Summer Sale offers $424 in FREE gear with the 60-mile XPress 750 commuter e-bikes at $1,299, more
items.summary:
Lectric has launched its Endless Summer Sale that is offering up to $720 in savings on its lineup of e-bike bundles, which includes the ongoing $500 price cut on the ONE Premium commuter e-bike. Among the group, we spotted a notably large bundle being given to Lectric’s XPress 750 Long-Range Commuter e-bikes that are getting $424 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped, in both its step-thru and step-over designs. This package would normally run you $1,723 without the bundle savings, which beats out all the bundles we’ve seen before that only ever amounted up to $410 in gear. Along with the e-bike (which is one of my favorite commuters over the years), you’ll be getting a rear cargo rack, fenders to go over both tires, an Elite headlight upgrade, a suspension seat post, two adjustable rear-view mirrors, and an accordion-style folding bike lock. Head below for more on this e-bike’s capabilities and the other deals we’re seeing while the sale lasts.

more…

items.title: Alienware’s 2025 Aurora R16 desktops with RTX 5070 Ti GPU are now a whopping $600 off from $1,500
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Dell that gets you Alienware’s latest Aurora R16 desktop with Ultra 7 265F/16GB/1TB/5070 Ti config for $1,499.99 shipped. That’s straight up a $600 discount on its $2,100 usual going rate, making this a great time to cash in. This particular machine dropped to $1,700 earlier this year in June, but today’s deal knocks it $200 below that price to mark a new best price to beat. Alternatively, you can also get the 32GB RAM/1TB SSD config for $1,699.99 shipped, which is also $400 less than its $2,300 usual going rate. Both discounted machines here are now priced below some builds carrying only an RTX 5060 Ti GPU, so be sure to check them out if you were looking to upgrade your battlestation after getting more details below.
